message: While the light outside hasn't changed, the time on my Coil reads night.
As I finish getting ready and put Ren in my bag, the door opens.

name: ミンク
message: "We're heading out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."
I nod and follow Mink.
The bird swoops down from the second floor and lands on his shoulder.
As soon as we step outside, I turn to see the tip of the tower piercing the starry sky.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Toue's up there, right?"

name: ミンク
message: "Yeah. He'll be there all through the Celebration."
We make our way through the bustling city.
As the distance between us and the tower shrinks, it looms ever larger in my sight.
I assumed we were just going to charge the tower, but Mink leads me down an alley to the side.
We wind up at a building across the street from the tower.
It's fairly tall, but it seems vacant. Maybe it's under maintenance or just there as decoration.
Mink heads not for the front door, but the back.
The door opens easily when he pulls.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It wasn't locked?"

name: ミンク
message: "It was broken."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Broken?"

name: ミンク
message: "My guys did it."
...So this is part of the plan too?
On the other side of the door are a staircase and an elevator. Nothing else.
We step into the elevator and Mink presses the button for the top floor.
...We're going to the roof?
Neither of us speaks. Only the sound of the motor fills the silence.
The elevator slides to a stop and the doors open.
Before me is a narrow hall and a door leading to the roof.
I guess this lock was broken too. Mink walks briskly up to the door and pushes it open.
